ggtibble 1.0.1.9000

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

ggtibble 1.0.1.9000

  • ggtibble() now warns if outercols are not used in either the caption or the labs argument (#13).
  • ggtibble and gglist objects now work with the ggplot2 %+% operator (#16)
  • A new ggsave() generic function will now enable simpler saving of ggtibble and gglist objects (unique filenames are required to save).
  • aes() and data.frame() objects can be added to ggtibble and gglist objects (#23).
  • ggsave() can accept a character vector of all filenames to use when saving (#25).

ggtibble 1.0.1

CRAN release: 2024-06-19

  • labs argument to ggtibble() can now include `NULL (#6)
  • guides() can now be added to gglist objects.
  • Labels created with the labs argument to ggtibble() will not longer all be the same (#3)
  • new_gglist() and new_ggtibble() are now exported making it easier to create objects.
